channel.title: Removing Start-Tutorial from Private Server
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Currently I'm busy developing my new server: SlaveScape. As base, I use the Matrix 718 Source. The only problem is that the starting-tutorial causes 99's when you have to jump to the wilderness... everyone gets 99 in all combat skills; like Strenght, Attack, Def, Magic etc.
This is way to lame cause I want people to work for their 99's not by joining and doing the quick and easy start tutorial.
Is there a way to remove this? Please let me know,
Thanks :)
[img]http://jobheger.com/tutorial/01.jpg[/img] [img]http://jobheger.com/tutorial/02.jpg[/img] [img]http://jobheger.com/tutorial/03.jpg[/img] [img]http://jobheger.com/tutorial/04.jpg[/img]

item.title: Removing Start-Tutorial from Private Server
item.dc:creator: @SlaveScape SlaveScape
item.description:
@SlaveScape wrote:

Hey guys,

Currently I’m busy developing my new server: SlaveScape.
As base, I use the Matrix 718 Source. The only problem is that
the starting-tutorial causes 99’s when you have to jump to the wilderness…
everyone gets 99 in all combat skills; like Strenght, Attack, Def, Magic etc.

This is way to lame cause I want people to work for their 99’s
not by joining and doing the quick and easy start tutorial.

Is there a way to remove this? Please let me know,

Thanks
